aws_emr_security_configuration.description: Provides a resource to manage AWS EMR Security Configurations

name.description: The name of the EMR Security Configuration. By default generated by Terraform.

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified

id.description: The ID of the EMR Security Configuration (Same as the `name`)

name.description: The Name of the EMR Security Configuration

creation_date.description: Date the Security Configuration was created
